meanings.sent1: The liplike petals of the flower were soft and delicate.
meanings.sent2: Her liplike smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The liplike design of the new sofa made it look like a giant pair of lips!
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with liplike hues of pink and red.
meanings.sent5: The baby's liplike pout was too adorable to resist.

meanings.definition: Having a shape or appearance similar to lips.
meanings.sent1: The liplike cushion on the chair was comfortable to lean against.
meanings.sent2: The cloud had a liplike curve that resembled a smile.
meanings.sent3: The liplike pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range had a liplike formation that seemed to kiss the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sculpture had a liplike contour that captured the artist's attention.
